text:
GoldRepublic | Developers | Amsterdam, The Netherlands | Full-time | Onsite | 4-6k

GoldRepublic is a small Amsterdam based fintech/software company behind a precious metal trading platform.

Foremost, we're trying to fill a place in our front-end team. If you match some or all of these, we'd love to speak to you: * Angular4 * TypeScript * RxJS * d3js * REST API Design * Webpack2

You'll be involved in the development of a huge control panel used for the internal management of a trading platform.

Other positions: -- DevOps Engineer -- Backend Developers -- Product Owners

If you're interested, shoot an intro email to: dev-recruitment@goldrebpulic.com
